original: badzra sva ra sva st'i s'a dha nam /
analyzed: badzra sva ra sva st'i s'a dha nam /

original: rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs /

original: 'phags ma dbyangs can ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags ma dbyangs can ma la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas snying gar chu skyes dmar po zla ba la do:yig dmar po'i sa bon yongs su gyur pa las chu skyes dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa la rang gi sa bon gyi snying po can /
analyzed: sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas snying gar chu skyes dmar po zla ba la do:yig dmar po'i sa bon yongs su gyur pa las chu skyes dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa la rang gi sa bon gyi snying po can /
translated: As previously described, on a red lotus and moon in the heart, the seed syllable DHOḥ becomes a red lotus with eight petals and the essence of one's seed syllable.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las /
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las /

original: bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje dbyangs can ma zhal gsum pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje dbyangs can ma zhal gsum pa /
translated: the Blessed Vajra Sarasvatī with three faces,

original: sku mdog dmar mo spyan gsum ma /
analyzed: sku mdog dmar mo spyan gsum ma /
translated: a red body, and three eyes.

original: sngon po dang dkar po ni g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal lo //🔽padma dang / ral gri dang / gri gug rnams phyag g-yas pa rnams na bsnams pa /
analyzed: sngon po dang dkar po ni g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal lo // padma dang / ral gri dang / gri gug rnams phyag g-yas pa rnams na bsnams pa /
translated: The right and left faces are blue and white.🔽She holds a lotus, sword, and flaying knife in her right hands,

original: thod pa dang / rin po che dang / 'khor lo rnams phyag g-yon pa rnams na bsnams pa /
analyzed: thod pa dang / rin po che dang / 'khor lo rnams phyag g-yon pa rnams na bsnams pa /
translated: and a skull cup, jewel, and chakram in her left hands.

original: zhabs g-yon brkyang ba'i gzhon nu ma'i lang tsho dang ldan pa /
analyzed: zhabs g-yon brkyang ba'i gzhon nu ma'i lang tsho dang ldan pa /
translated: She is youthful, with the left leg extended.

original: thugs kar gnas pa'i sa bon gyi mtshan mas gzhan gyi don mdzad par spro ba'i bdag nyid bsgoms nas /
analyzed: thugs kar gnas pa'i sa bon gyi mtshan mas gzhan gyi don mdzad par spro ba'i bdag nyid bsgoms nas /
translated: Meditate on her as the nature of delight in benefiting others with the seed syllable at her heart.🔽Recite the mantra:

original: aom pi tsu pi tsu pradzny'a bardha ni /
analyzed: aom pi tsu pi tsu pradzny'a bardha ni /

original: dzva la dzva la me dha bardha ni /
analyzed: dzva la dzva la me dha bardha ni /

original: dhi ri dhi ri bu dhi bardha ni sv'a h'a /🔽zhes pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: dhi ri dhi ri bu dhi bardha ni sv'a h'a / zhes pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //

original: rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The sādhana of Vajra Sarasvatī is complete.
